src:
'Bukan Masalah Komitmen, Pemain MU Memang Tidak Cukup Bagus'
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemain-pemain Manchester United diyakini sudah berkomitmen memberikan yang terbaik pada setiap pertandingan. Mereka sudah berjuang habis-habisan, hanya memang kurang mumpuni dan pada akhirnya gagal memetik hasil terbaik.
Pasukan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ini punya satu masalah utama: inkonsistensi. MU bisa tampil begitu impresif pada satu pertandingan, lalu merosot begitu buruk pada pertandingan berikutnya. Masalah ini berulang dan sudah bertahan lama.
Beberapa mantan pemain dan analis Premier League bersepakat, mereka menilai pemain-pemain MU yang sekarang tidak memahami nilai kostum yang mereka kenakan. Paul Pogba dkk. dianggap tidak bermain maksimal, belum berdarah-darah untuk MU.
Kendati demikian, analis Premier League, Tony Cascarino, berada di seberang paham tersebut. Dia tidak pernah meragukan komitmen pemain-pemain MU.

Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
'Not a matter of commitment, MU players are not good enough'
Nov 04 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United players are believed to have committed to giving their best in every match. They have fought all out, only indeed less qualified and ultimately failed to reap the best results.
This Ole Gunnar Solskjaer troop has one major problem: inconsistency. MU can look so impressive in one game, then slumped so badly in the next match. This problem is recurring and has lasted long.
Some former Premier League players and analysts agree, they judge MU players who now do not understand the value of the costumes they wear. Paul Pogba et al. considered not playing optimally, not bleeding for MU.
However, Premier League analyst Tony Cascarino is across the line. He never doubted the commitment of Manchester United players.

Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
